src:
Wakapolda dan 5 Kapolres di Polda Sulteng Dimutasi
04 Nov 2019, 11:30 by Mohammad Qadri
Palu - Wakapolda dan lima Kapolres di wilayah Polda Sulawesi Tengah dimutasi. Mutasi tertuang di Surat Telegram Kapolri yang ditandatangani Asisten Sumber Daya Manusia Irjen Eko Indra Heri tertanggal 21 Oktober 2019.
Kapolda Sulteng Brigjen Lukman Wahyu Hariyanto saat ditanya mengenai mutasi tersebut membenarkannya. Lukman berharap tiap kapolres di wilayah menjalani tugas dengan baik dengan mengutamakan mengayomi masyarakat.
"Iya, ada mutasi pejabat utama Polda Sulteng, mulai dari Pak Wakapolda, Kabid Hukum, Kabid TIK, hingga lima pejabat kapolres," Kata Lukman usai memimpin serah terima jabatan di Mapolda Sulteng, Palu, Senin (4/11/2019).

Berikut ini daftar mutasi pejabat di Polda Sulteng:

Wakapolda Sulteng Kombes Polisi Setyo Boedi Moempoeni Harso yang diangkat dalam jabatan barunya sebagai Karodalops Sops Polri. Jabatan Wakapolda Sulteng akan dijabat Brigjen Nurwindiyanto yang saat ini bertugas BNP2TKI.
Selanjutnya, Kepala Biro Operasional (Karo Ops) Kombes Iman Wahyudi yang dimutasi sebagai Kabag Kermadalugri Rojianstra Slog Polri. Pejabat baru Karo Ops Polda Sulteng adalah Kombes Polisi Laksana dari Korbrimob Polri.
Kabid Hukum AKBP I Gusti Putu Purwa dimutasi sebagai Irbid Itwasda Polda Sulteng dan digantikan AKBP Mugi Sekar Jaya dari Wakil Direktur Reskrimum Polda Sulteng. Dan Kabid TIK Polda Sulteng AKBP Moch Haritsuddin yang dimutasi sebagai perwira menengah Polda Sulteng akan diganti AKBP Suliono yang saat ini masih menjabat Wakil Direktur Intelkam Polda Sulteng.
text:
Deputy Police Chief and 5 Kapolres in Central Sulawesi Police are Mutated
Nov 04 2019, 11:30 by Mohammad Qadri
Palu - Wakapolda and five Kapolres in the Central Sulawesi Regional Police are mutated. The mutation was stated in the Chief of Police's Telegram Letter signed by the Assistant of Human Resources Inspector General Eko Indra Heri dated October 21, 2019.
Central Sulawesi Regional Police Chief Brigadier General Lukman Wahyu Hariyanto when asked about the mutation confirmed it. Lukman hopes that each Kapolres in the region will carry out their duties well by prioritizing protecting the community.
"Yes, there are mutations of the Central Sulawesi Regional Police chief officials, ranging from Pak Wakapolda, Head of Law, Head of ICT, to five police chief officers," Lukman said after leading the handover of positions at the Central Sulawesi Police Headquarters, Palu, Monday (11/04/2019).

The following is a list of mutations of officials in Central Sulawesi Regional Police:

Central Sulawesi Deputy Police Chief Senior Commissioner Setyo Boedi Moempoeni Harso was appointed in his new position as Karodalops Sops Polri. The position of Central Sulawesi Deputy Police Head will be held by Brigjen Nurwindiyanto who is currently in charge of BNP2TKI.
Furthermore, Head of Operational Bureau (Karo Ops) Kombes Iman Wahyudi who was transferred as the Head of Kermadalugri Rojianstra Police Slog. The new Karo Ops Officer of the Central Sulawesi Regional Police is the Senior Commissioner of Police Like the Korbrimob Polri.
Head of AKBP Law I Gusti Putu Purwa was transferred as Irbid Itwasda Central Sulawesi Regional Police and replaced by AKBP Mugi Sekar Jaya from Deputy Director of Central Sulawesi Police Reskrimum. And Head of Central Sulawesi Police ICT TIK AKBP Moch Haritsuddin who was transferred as a middle-ranking officer of Central Sulawesi Police will be replaced by AKBP Suliono who is currently still serving as Deputy Director of Central Sulawesi Police Intelligence.
